oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certain kinds of Food, used by Bushmen. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-1. 6107, 18. 7598-7601). An account of the food (plants and berries) eaten by people throughout the year. 1) p.7599v: a description of the !kerri berry, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Food eaten by Bushmen (five types of berries and roots)
